mapper.select: SELECT branch_no branchNo, sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, expire_memo expireMemo, quantity, createdate FROM sports_equipment_expire LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT se.sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, se.item_name itemName, se.item_price itemPrice, sei.sports_equipment_img_file_name sportsEquipmentImgFileName, se.createdate FROM sports_equipment se LEFT OUTER JOIN sports_equipment_img sei ON se.sports_equipment_no = sei.sports_equipment_no ORDER BY se.sports_equipment_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, item_name itemName, item_price itemPrice FROM sports_equipment WHERE sports_equipment_no = #{sportsEquipmentNo}

SELECT seo.order_no orderNo, seo.branch_no branchNo, seo.sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, se.item_name itemName, se.item_price itemPrice, seo.quantity, (se.item_price*seo.quantity) totalPrice, seo.order_status orderStatus, seo.createdate FROM sports_equipment_order seo INNER JOIN sports_equipment se ON seo.sports_equipment_no = se.sports_equipment_no LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sports_equipment_order WHERE branch_no = #{branchNo}
SELECT sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, item_name itemName, item_price itemPrice, updatedate FROM sports_equipment

SELECT se.sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, se.item_name itemName, ((select SUM(seo.quantity) FROM sports_equipment_order seo WHERE seo.branch_no = #{branchNo} AND seo.order_status ='승인' AND seo.sports_equipment_no = sportsEquipmentNo) - nvl((select SUM(see.quantity) FROM sports_equipment_expire see WHERE see.branch_no = #{branchNo} AND see.sports_equipment_no = sportsEquipmentNo),0)) quantity FROM sports_equipment_order seo LEFT OUTER JOIN sports_equipment se ON seo.sports_equipment_no = se.sports_equipment_no WHERE seo.order_status = '승인' AND seo.branch_no = #{branchNo} GROUP BY se.sports_equipment_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sports_equipment_expire( sports_equipment_no, branch_no, quantity, expire_memo ) VALUES ( #{sportsEquipmentNo}, #{branchNo}, #{quantity}, #{expireMemo} )
mapper.select: SELECT seo.order_no orderNo, se.item_name itemName, seo.quantity quantity, seo.order_status orderStatus, seo.createdate createdate FROM sports_equipment_order seo INNER JOIN sports_equipment se ON seo.sports_equipment_no = se.sports_equipment_no WHERE branch_no = #{branchNo} LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sports_equipment_img( sports_equipment_no, sports_equipment_img_origin_name, sports_equipment_img_file_name, sports_equipment_img_size, sports_equipment_img_type ) VALUES ( #{sportsEquipmentNo}, #{sportsEquipmentImgOriginName}, #{sportsEquipmentImgFileName}, #{sportsEquipmentImgSize}, #{sportsEquipmentImgType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sports_equipment SET item_name = #{itemName}, item_price = #{itemPrice}, updatedate = NOW() WHERE sports_equipment_no = #{sportsEquipmentNo}
mapper.select: SELECT se.sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, seo.branch_no branchNo, se.item_name itemName, ((select SUM(seo.quantity) FROM sports_equipment_order seo WHERE seo.branch_no = #{branchNo} AND seo.order_status ='승인' AND seo.sports_equipment_no = sportsEquipmentNo) - nvl((select SUM(see.quantity) FROM sports_equipment_expire see WHERE see.branch_no = #{branchNo} AND see.sports_equipment_no = sportsEquipmentNo),0)) quantity FROM sports_equipment_order seo INNER JOIN sports_equipment se ON seo.sports_equipment_no = se.sports_equipment_no INNER JOIN branch b ON seo.branch_no = b.branch_no WHERE b.branch_no = #{branchNo} AND seo.order_status ='승인' GROUP BY se.sports_equipment_no
